name: kccg-performance-measure
title: Measure Variant Call Performance (KCCG)
summary: Calculate WGS performance metrics from a single-sample VCF of NA12878 calls

inputSpec.name: vcfgz
inputSpec.label: Variants
inputSpec.help: Input NA12878 genotype calls to be validated, in vcf.gz format.

inputSpec.name: bam
inputSpec.label: Mapped reads
inputSpec.help: The mapped NA12878 reads used to generate the genotype calls being tested, in bam format.

inputSpec.name: bai
inputSpec.label: Mapped read index
inputSpec.help: An index for the mapped reads.

inputSpec.name: region
inputSpec.label: Region BED
inputSpec.help: Limit analysis to the regions in this BED only.

inputSpec.name: store_variants
inputSpec.label: Store variants
inputSpec.help: Store all region-filtered variant calls in the output RDS.

outputSpec.label: Performance results RDS
outputSpec.help: An RDS (R data serialization) containing performance metrics.
outputSpec.name: rds
